-- | Solarized colour theme for the Yi text editor
--   
@package yi-solarized
@version 0.1.1


module Yi.Style.Solarized

-- | The main theme specification. An example use in your <tt>yi.hs</tt>
--   might look something like
--   
--   <pre>
--   main :: IO ()
--   main = yi $ myConfig {
--     defaultKm = defaultKm myConfig
--     , startFrontEnd = start
--     , configUI = (configUI defaultConfig) { configTheme = solarizedTheme }
--     }
--   </pre>
solarizedTheme :: Proto UIStyle
